datastream@id.description: Local ID of the datastream that this observation is part of

datastream@link.description: Link to the datastream that this observation is part of

foi@id.description: Local ID of the sampling feature that is the target of this observation

foi@link.description: Link to the sampling feature that is the target of this observation

procedure@id.description: Local ID of the procedure/method used to make this observation

procedure@link.description: Link to the procedure/method used to make this observation

phenomenonTime.description: Time at which the observation result is a valid estimate of the sampling feature property(ies). Defaults to the same value as `resultTime`.

resultTime.description: Time at which the observation result was generated. If omitted on creation, the server sets it to the time the request was received.

parameters.description: Parameters of the observation. Must be valid according to the parameters schema provided in the datastream metadata.

result.description: Result of the observation. Must be valid according to the result schema provided in the datastream metadata.

result@links.description: Link to external result data (e.g. large raster dataset served by a tiling service)
